content.question: How are your names displayed on the marriage certificate?
content.questionTrans: How are your names displayed on the marriage certificate translation?
content.copy: These will be the names you both used before you were married, such as maiden names.
content.hint: Copy the certificate exactly. For example, if it says “Sarah Brown (formerly known as Sarah Smith)” then enter that.
content.hintTrans: Copy the translation exactly. For example, if it says “Sarah Brown (formerly known as Sarah Smith)” then enter that.
